name: VNContoursObservation
desc: An object that represents the detected contours in an image.

items.name: var contourCount: Int
items.desc: The total number of detected contours.

items.name: var normalizedPath: CGPath
items.desc: The detected contours as a path object in normalized coordinates.

items.name: var topLevelContourCount: Int
items.desc: The total number of detected top-level contours.

items.name: func contour(at: Int) -> VNContour
items.desc: Retrieves the contour object at the specified index, irrespective of hierarchy.

items.name: func contour(at: IndexPath) -> VNContour
items.desc: Retrieves the contour object at the specified index path.

items.name: class VNContour
items.desc: A class that represents a detected contour in an image.
